detail.detail: Adding to the previous trigger value: If you select this option, you must also specify a value in the Repeat Increment field.
Subtracting from the previous trigger value: If you select this option, you must also specify a value in the Repeat Increment field,

Do not run again: If selected (set to true), runs the trigger once when conditions satisfy the trigger criteria. The task remains inactive until you activate it manually. You can use this model for one-time maintenance events or tasks that require human intervention to recalculate the trigger conditions.
Stop monitoring task for a specific time: If you select this option, you must also specify a time interval using the Pause for and Pause until fields.
